txt.en: 'Well met again, [placeholder]. We have more news from the fortress of Caranost. The Orcs there send expeditionary forces across the bridge with increasing frequency. Sírlond asks for our assistance in pushing across the bridge in an effort to not only drive the foe back but also to start a counter offensive. Are you willing to make the charge across the bridge?'
Your success at forging across the bridge affords the encampment at Sírlond a welcome respite. Return to the mission giver with this report.
There is no twist in this mission.

In an effort to drive the Orcs back out of Sírlond and out of Caranost, you were recruited to battle across the bridge that links the outpost and the ruin. If you are successful, the hope is that you can establish a foothold on the other side of the ancient bridge.
'Your objective is clear, [placeholder], make your way across the bridge defeating whatever the foe throws at you as you battle across. The hopes of Sírlond rest upon your able shoulders.'
'A message-raven arrived just ahead of you, [placeholder]. You are victorious again. Sírlond is appreciative and the Free People rejoice in this victory. Thank you for your efforts.'
Complete the Mission: The Bridge to Caranost
Speak with the mission giver and have them escort you to the Bridge of Caranost where you will attempt to drive the Orcs back into the ruin.
